pt.com.gmv.lab.implant.rendering.poi.util
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  pt.com.gmv.lab.implant.rendering.poi.util.Matrix

public final class Matrix
extends Object

A 3x3 matrix that allows for various operations on it.

Since:
2
Author:
fao
